document_data.title: Weapons
document_data.realm year: [[1370 DR]]<ref>{{Cite organized play/LC/Sea of Tears|3}}The opening narration of the adventure states that it takes place after the War with Myrkyssa Jelan, which ended in 1370 DR. The narration highlights the presence of numerous buildings in states of rubble and ongoing construction, which would suggest that it has not been that long since the War came to an end.
